name: Conformity (Alessandro "Ordnas" Capriolo)
description:
The majoritiy of the game is set in an abbandoned house,  where the player needs to explore, check objects like portraits and furniture to progress. Inanimate objects and ambient noises will be part of this small experience to contribute to the overall atmosphere. 

It is highly suggested to play the game with headphones.

Minimum system requirements:
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i3-2130 or equivalent
Memory:  8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 1 GB

Recommended system requirements:
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon RX 580
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 1 GB

Follow Conformity
